ComicInfo.Penciller: Mike Roy,Nick Cardy,George Roussos,Gene Fawcette,Alex Toth,George Tuska,George Roussos,Gene Fawcette,Alex Toth,George Tuska,Mike Roy
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Thing from the Dark: On an expedition in Peru, Larry Graham is caught in a cave-in caused by his rival. He survives underground, but turns into a monster mole yearning for human blood. Larry goes on a killing spree, finally getting his claws on the man responsible for his situation.
The Thing in the Well: A traveling salesman encounters a horrible, ghost-like creature living in an abandoned well.
Grip on Life: A corrupt district attorney is brought to poetic justice by his wife who returned from the dead after a car accident. When she finds out that he doesn't love her anymore, she goes back to the grave - taking him with her.
The Helmsman: A sailor spreads lies about his brave captain, steals the man's girl, even beats her to death eventually. Finally he is punished by the captain's ghost and dragged under water.
The Beast Within: The ugly Don Maynard is the laughing stock on campus. He dons the skin of a grizzly bear, turns into a wild beast and takes cruel revenge on all who made fun of him.
Weird Facts: Account of cruel rites of sunken civilizations.
The Screaming Skulls: An evildoer is haunted by the floating heads of his victims.
Edge of Darkness: A witch's evil plan to ruin a marriage is thwarted by the ever watchful father of the bride, who happens to be the local witch hunter.
ComicInfo.Title: The Thing from the Dark; The Thing in the Well; Grip on Life; The Helmsman; The Beast Within; Weird Facts; The Screaming Skulls; Edge of Darkness
